member.name: M:BoneworksModdingToolkit.AssetBundles.LoadBundle(System.String,UnityEngine.AssetBundle@)
member.summary: Loads the given bundle from Mods/AssetBundles
member.returns: True if the bundle was successfully loaded

member.name: M:BoneworksModdingToolkit.BMTManager.UpdateSpawnMenu
member.summary: Resets object pools and updates the UI

member.summary: Prefab should be a new unique instance of the object. You need to switch levels for new items to show up.

member.name: M:BoneworksModdingToolkit.SpawnMenu.UpdateUI
member.summary: Should only be run when the spawn menu is opened. Not every frame!
member.returns: True if the UI was successfully updated.

member.name: M:BoneworksModdingToolkit.SpawnMenu.UpdatePools
